Combat Stats

Combat Stats (or simply stats or bonuses) are bonuses found in the Worn Equipment section of the interface which are determined by a player's equipment and skills. Combat bonuses are split into two categories: Offensive Stats and Defensive Stats. All...

Maximum hit

Maximum hit is a term used to describe the highest amount of damage that can be inflicted in a single hitsplat. The maximum hit allowable is 32,000. Damage in RuneScape is stored as a short type integer, giving a maximum value of 32,767; however,...

item.title: Getting hits more accurate!HELP!
item.dc:creator: @dagger9090 dagger9090
item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

So basically i want my hits to be right, pking isnt right on my server and i was people to be able to pk so my server will be no good like this.
the hits are all crappy, so someone should give me a good idea of how to change this code to get the rights hits.

[code] public void CalculateMaxHit() {
double MaxHit = 0;
int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; // Strength Bonus
int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; // Strength
int RngBonus = playerBonus[4]; // Ranged Bonus
int Range = playerLevel[playerRanged]; // Ranged

	if ((FightType == 1) || (FightType == 4)) {
		// Accurate & Defensive
		MaxHit += (double) (1.01 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00695));
	} else if (FightType == 2) {
		// Aggresive
		MaxHit += (double) (1.01 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00695));
	} else if (FightType == 3) {
		// Controlled
		MaxHit += (double) (1.01 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00695));
	}
	MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.2);
	/*
	 * if (StrPotion == 1) { // Strength Potion MaxHit += (double) (Strength *
	 * 0.0014); } else if (StrPotion == 2) { // Super Strength Potion MaxHit +=
	 * (double) (Strength * 0.0205); }
	 */
	if (StrPrayer == 1) {
		// Burst Of Strength
		MaxHit += 1;
	} else if (StrPrayer == 2) {
		// Super Human Strength
		MaxHit += 2;
	} else if (StrPrayer == 3) {
		// Ultimate Strength
		MaxHit += 3;
	}
	if ((FightType == 5) || (FightType == 6)) {
		// Accurate and Longranged
		MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (RngBonus * Range) * 0.00075));
	} else if (FightType == 7) {
		// Rapid
		MaxHit += (double) (1.35 + (double) ((double) (RngBonus) * 0.00025));
	}
	// MaxHit += (double) (Range * 0.03);
	playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit);

maxhit = MaxHit;
maxhita= playerMaxHit;
}[/code]

Sometimes you will hit 0, 0, 0, 0, then like all of a sudden 1 hit your opponent and kill them instantly, thats with all 99’s on both accounts, and also dragon claws hit way to high and do it too.
if someone has good ideas for how to change this code to make it more like real rs or a great pk server and how to do specs or something i would appreciate it!

Read full topic
